trans-unit.source: Represents the menu structure of a form.

Although <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" /> replaces and adds functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> control of previous versions, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> control represents the container for the menu structure of a form.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> controllo rappresenta il contenitore della struttura di menu di un form.

trans-unit.source: A menu is composed of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: È costituito da un menu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> gli oggetti che rappresentano i singoli comandi di menu nella struttura di menu.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> può essere un comando per l'applicazione o un menu padre per altri elementi di sottomenu.

trans-unit.source: To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that will display it, assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Per associare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> che sarà visualizzato, assegnare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: For applications that will have support for multiple languages, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> property to display the text of the menu from right to left to support languages such as Arabic.
trans-unit.target: Per le applicazioni con supporto per più lingue, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> proprietà per visualizzare il testo del menu da destra a sinistra per supportare lingue quali l'arabo.

trans-unit.source: You can create different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> objects to represent different menu structures for your form.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare diversi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> oggetti per rappresentare diverse strutture di menu per il modulo.

trans-unit.source: If you want to reuse the menu structure contained in a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, you can use its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> method to create a copy.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera riutilizzare la struttura di menu contenuta in uno specifico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, è possibile utilizzare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> metodo per creare una copia.

trans-unit.source: Once you have a copy of the menu structure, you can make the appropriate modifications for your new menu structure.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver creato una copia della struttura di menu, è possibile apportare le modifiche appropriate per la nuova struttura di menu.

trans-unit.source: Cutting and pasting menu items from one form to another in the designer might not work as expected if the form you are pasting into has no menu items defined.
trans-unit.target: Tagliare e incollare gli elementi da un formato a altro nella finestra di progettazione potrebbero non funzionare come previsto se il form che sta incollando non contiene voci di menu definiti menu.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, assigns two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> and binds it to a form.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio di codice seguente crea un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, vengono assegnati due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> oggetti per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> e lo associa a un form.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> created that is named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si suppone una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> creato denominata `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> class without any specified menu items.
This version of the constructor creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> without any specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Questa versione del costruttore crea un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> senza alcuna specificato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: To add menu items to the control use the other version of this constructor that accepts an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects as its parameter or use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere voci di menu al controllo utilizzano l'altra versione del costruttore che accetta una matrice di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> oggetti come relativo parametro o utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, assigns two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> and binds it to a form.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio di codice seguente crea un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, vengono assegnati due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> oggetti per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> e lo associa a un form.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> created that is named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si suppone una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> creato denominata `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> representing the container of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> class with the specified container.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> objects that will be added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> with a specified set of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> objects.
You can use this constructor to assign an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> at the time of its creation.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo costruttore per assegnare una matrice di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> oggetti per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> al momento della creazione.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> has been created you can add additional <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Dopo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> è stato creato è possibile aggiungere ulteriori <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> oggetti per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, and assigns two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> using this version of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio di codice seguente crea un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>e vengono assegnati due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> oggetti per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> utilizzando questa versione del costruttore.

trans-unit.source: The example then binds the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene quindi associato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> created that is named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si suppone una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> creato denominata `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> that is a duplicate of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> that represents the cloned menu.
You can use this method to create a copy of the menu structure stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo per creare una copia della struttura di menu archiviata in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to reuse the menu structure stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> as the foundation for a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo per riutilizzare la struttura di menu archiviati in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> come base per un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to create a menu structure that has the same menu items as an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> but will also have additional <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects added to it, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> method to create a copy of the original <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> and then add the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the cloned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si desidera creare una struttura di menu che abbia le stesse voci di menu di un oggetto esistente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> ma anche avere ulteriori <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> gli oggetti aggiunti, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> metodo per creare una copia dell'originale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> e Aggiungere quindi la nuova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> oggetti clonato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is currently parented to the form.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> per determinare se un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> è attualmente associato al form padre.

trans-unit.source: If the call in the example code to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se la chiamata nell'esempio di codice per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> non restituisce `null`, il codice Duplica la struttura di menu del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The code then sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> property to true on the new copy of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> that can be used for languages that support right to left text.
trans-unit.target: Il codice imposta quindi la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> proprietà su true nella nuova copia del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> per creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> che può essere usato per le lingue che supportano diritto di testo a sinistra.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> created that is named `mainMenu1`.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si suppone una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> creato denominata `mainMenu1`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the main menu collapses.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato l'utilizzo di questo membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Collapse> event.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio, un gestore eventi genera report sull'occorrenza del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Collapse> evento.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Questo report consente di capire quando l'evento si verifica e possa agevolare il debug.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Per generare un report su più eventi o per gli eventi che si verificano di frequente, è possibile sostituire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> con <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o aggiungere il messaggio a un controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> named `MainMenu1`.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire l'esempio di codice, incollarlo in un progetto che contiene un'istanza del tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> denominato `MainMenu1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Collapse> event.
trans-unit.target: Assicurarsi quindi che il gestore dell'evento è associato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Collapse> evento.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new handle to the Menu.
A handle to the menu if the method succeeds; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
<see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" />.
Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Dispose%2A> dopo aver terminato di utilizzare l'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Dispose%2A> lascia l'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> in una condizione di inutilizzabilità.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Dispose%2A>, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> in modo che la memoria occupata può essere recuperata tramite garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare sempre il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Dispose%2A> prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> non è verranno liberate finché garbage collection di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> distruttore dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> that contains this control.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> that is the container for this control.
Returns <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" /> is not currently hosted on a form.
This property enables you to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is parented to a form.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente di determinare se uno specifico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> è associato a un form padre.

trans-unit.source: The property is typically used when multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> objects are being used on a form and you need to determine which one is currently being used by a form.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà è in genere utilizzato quando più <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> vengono utilizzati gli oggetti in un form e per determinare quale è attualmente utilizzato da un form.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is currently parented to the form.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> per determinare se un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> è attualmente associato al form padre.

trans-unit.source: If the call in the example code to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se la chiamata nell'esempio di codice per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> non restituisce `null`, il codice Duplica la struttura di menu del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The code then sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> property to true on the new copy of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> that can be used for languages that support right to left text.
trans-unit.target: Il codice imposta quindi la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> proprietà su true nella nuova copia del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> per creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> che può essere usato per le lingue che supportano diritto di testo a sinistra.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> created that is named `mainMenu1`.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si suppone una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> creato denominata `mainMenu1`.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Collapse" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato un evento, il gestore dell'evento viene richiamato tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.OnCollapse%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.OnCollapse%2A> consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: È la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.OnCollapse(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.OnCollapse(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.OnCollapse(System.EventArgs)" /> in una classe derivata, assicurarsi di chiamare la classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.OnCollapse(System.EventArgs)" /> metodo in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the text displayed by the control is displayed from right to left.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" />.

trans-unit.source: This property enables your menus to support languages that are written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente il supporto di lingue con scrittura da destra a sinistra nei menu.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `RightToLeft.Yes`, the menu item text will be displayed from right to left instead of the default left to right method.
trans-unit.target: Quando questa proprietà è impostata su `RightToLeft.Yes`, il testo delle voci dal menu visualizzato da destra a sinistra anziché da sinistra a destra.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how enabling right-to-left alignment affects Windows Forms controls, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli effetti dell'abilitazione dell'allineamento da destra a sinistra sui controlli Windows Form, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is currently parented to the form.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> per determinare se un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> è attualmente associato al form padre.

trans-unit.source: If the call in the example code to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se la chiamata nell'esempio di codice per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.GetForm%2A> non restituisce `null`, il codice Duplica la struttura di menu del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The example code then sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> property to `RightToLeft.Yes` on the new copy of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> that can be used for languages that support right to left text.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice imposta quindi la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> proprietà `RightToLeft.Yes` nella nuova copia del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> per creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> che può essere usato per le lingue che supportano testo a sinistra da destra a.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> created that is named `mainMenu1`.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si suppone una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> creato denominata `mainMenu1`.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a valid member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> enumeration.
Returns a string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" />.
A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu" />.
The return string includes the type and the string returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ToString%2A> method if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is assigned to a form.
trans-unit.target: La stringa restituita include il tipo e la stringa restituita dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ToString%2A> metodo se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> viene assegnato a un form.
